Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won the toss and opted to bowl first.
India tied with Sri Lanka (India won Super Over by 2 wickets).
Kusal Perera scored 46 runs off 34 balls.
Maheesh Theekshana took 3 wickets for 28 runs.
Washington Sundar was named Man of the Match for his all-round performance.
Suryakumar Yadav was named Player of the Series.
Riyan Parag expressed disappointment for not managing to bat through.
Sri Lanka were well placed at 110/1 but ended up in a Super Over.
India managed to snatch the game from the jaws of a probable defeat.
Pre-Game Insights: The match was scheduled to start on Tuesday, 30 July 2024, at 7:00 PM (IST).
Sri Lanka won the toss and opted to bowl first.
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav expressed pride in the team's character and performance.
Charith Asalanka expressed disappointment with the middle order's shot selection.
Washington Sundar expressed gratitude for the opportunity to play for India and highlighted the importance of hitting the right lines and lengths.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy.
India needed 3 runs to win in the Super Over and achieved it with a boundary by Suryakumar Yadav.
Sri Lanka's fans were shell-shocked by the outcome of the match.
